alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Greene; Southeast Monroe (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 16 at 7:34PM CST until February 18 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THURSDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THURSDAY TO 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, south winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. For the High Wind Warning, south winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. Locally higher gusts up to 80 mph are possible across the highest peaks, mainly above 5000 feet. * WHERE...Cocke Smoky Mountains, Southeast Greene, Blount Smoky Mountains, Sevier Smoky Mountains and Southeast Monroe Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 7 AM EST Thursday. For the High Wind Warning, from 7 AM Thursday to 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Greene; Southeast Monroe
